attributes.action: Stop Funeral Pyres being granted in ENGLAND (BY ETHNIC MINORITES)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is to stop the planned court bid by ethnics to allow them to hold open funeral pyres like the one held in 2006 in Northumberland.
Especially when no garden fires are allowed anymore and smoking is to be banned in public places on health grounds so should these fires do you want to  breath in other peoples remains.
